doc: Chrome Window opens with "data/" url instead of the URL specified on Chrome Portable

Chrome WebDriver works with my local installation of Chrome Version 80, with the Selenium WebDriver for version 80. However, it doesn't with Chrome Portable Version 80. Instead it tries to reach one of the following URLs: "data/", "data;" or "dat/", and doesn't abort with an error.
## Test script or set of commands reproducing this issue
